member.name: T:CheepDTO
member.summary: Data Transfer Object used to represent cheeps in the UI layer.
member.remarks: Contains the author's display name, the message text and a formatted timestamp string.

member.name: P:CheepDTO.Author
member.summary: The display name of the cheep's author.

member.name: P:CheepDTO.Message
member.summary: The text content of the cheep.
